Isekai Succubus.Description: Otherworldly entities who are reincarnated into the world of Golarion as a Succubus have both extreme beauty and power.

Black Roses.Description: You are a member of The Black Roses, an evil syndicate of powerful women plotting to take over Golarion.

Black Rose Matriarch.Description: A matriarch of The Black Roses, an evil syndicate of powerful women plotting to take over Golarion.
